---
title: "Multi-Table Report"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(knitr, kableExtra)
```
## Tables Report
```{r test}
for (i in seq_along(tables)) {
  cat(paste0("
### ", names(tables)[i], "

"))
  print(kable(tables[[i]], format = "html") %>% 
    kable_styling())
  cat("
")
}
```
